input.sentences: limestone is a fun place to go .
the tour guide was friendly and fun .
output.sentences: Up ahead I saw the big green sign that announced I was getting closer to my destination.
Until now Limestone County had been real only in stories my grandfather had told me long ago.
I was born and raised in North Carolina but Texas was a whole different kind of southern.
The whispers from the Colonel's Spring rang loud in my imagination and I walked into yesterday.
My dream was broken when the rattle of the wagon wheels turned into a golf cart coming to take me to the big house.
